KnowledgeItem.Title: DeployShardedMongoDbClusterWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for Configure Sharded MongoDB Cluster by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding data blocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock DeployShardedMongoDbClusterWorkflow and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${DSMDCW:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${DSMDCW:Host}
				User=${DSMDCW:User}
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Command='sudo mkdir -p ${DSMDCW:Path} && sudo mongod --fork --syslog --configsvr --dbpath ${DSMDCW:Path} --port ${DSMDCW:ConfigServerPort}'
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${DSMDCW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created      
				ConfigServerHostnames=${DSMDCW:ConfigServerHostnames}
				Host=${DSMDCW:Host}
				User=${DSMDCW:User}
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Command='sudo mongos --fork --syslog --configdb ${DSMDCW:ConfigServerHostnames}:${DSMDCW:ConfigServerPort}'
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>
